Title: Alumina Signs Binding Agreement on $2.2 Billion Alcoa Takeover
Content: Alumina said its independent nonexecutive directors and CEO recommend shareholders vote in favor of the proposed takeover.

Title: Incident on Latam Flight Injures Dozens Aboard Boeing 787 Dreamliner
Content: The Chilean airline says the jet experienced ‘a strong movement’ during a trip from Sydney to Auckland. First responders treated about 50 people.

Title: Behind the Alaska Blowout: a Manufacturing Habit Boeing Can’t Break
Content: Snafus in production mean work gets completed out of sequence. “It creates opportunities for failure.”

Title: East Coast, Gulf Coast Dockworker Talks are Starting Under Threat of a Strike
Content: The International Longshoremen’s Association is seeking to build on strong wage gains other transportation unions have won. The dockworkers’ union is already threatening a strike.

Title: For CFOs Tackling Weakened SEC Climate Rule, Cost Challenges Persist
Content: Some companies could face difficulties in obtaining a high level of assurance around greenhouse-gas emissions.

Title: EQT and Equitrans Midstream to Combine in Big Natural-Gas Deal
Content: The all-stock transaction will reunite EQT with its former pipeline business.

Title: It Isn’t Just Big Tech Propelling Gains in the Stock Market Anymore
Content: A broader group of companies has fueled the recent climb to records.

Title: What You Need to Know About Gold’s Curious Rally
Content: An odd cocktail of factors is spurring the haven asset to records.

Title: Eighty Percent of the World’s Stock Options Aren’t Traded Where You Think
Content: Bitcoin and GameStop made headlines. But an even wilder speculative mania has emerged in India.

Title: EQT and Equitrans Midstream to Combine in Big Natural-Gas Deal
Content: The all-stock transaction will reunite EQT with its former pipeline business.

Title: Advance Auto Parts Strikes Settlement With Dan Loeb’s Third Point
Content: The company will add three new directors to its board.

Title: S&P 500 Slips Ahead of Key Inflation Data
Content: The benchmark stock index edged down 0.1% but remained within 1% of its record. Tuesday’s report on the consumer-price index could shed light on when the Fed might start cutting interest rates.

Title: Miami’s Office Market Was Red-Hot. Now Its Tallest Planned Tower Can’t Fill Its Space.
Content: The 1,000-foot project under construction is still searching for an anchor tenant.

Title: A $400 Million Bet Says This Is the Mall of the Future
Content: Pickleball, luxury apartments, a hotel and more are breathing new life into America’s oldest mall.

Title: A Mistake in a Tesla and a Panicked Final Call: The Death of Angela Chao
Content: What happened on a remote Texas ranch in a billionaire shipping scion’s final hours.

Title: How Do Two Townhouses Become One $75 Million Mansion? ‘It’s Like a Puzzle.’
Content: A New York City developer chronicles the complicated task of combining two Manhattan walkups into a single, 42-foot-wide residence.

Title: A $120 Million Penthouse Will Become the Miami Area’s Most Expensive Home
Content: The oceanfront condo spanning about 10,500 square feet is located at the Shore Club in Miami Beach.

Title: This Architect Could’ve Lived ‘High Above the Clouds.’ Instead He Chose Community.
Content: Eran Chen brings us inside his New York loft, which he divided into four distinct zones—including a leafy indoor garden.
